titles.title: Honoring the Covina Pony League Baseball Team of Covina, California, for winning the 2017 Pony League World Series Championship.
Honoring the Covina Pony League Baseball Team of Covina, California, for winning the 2017 Pony League World Series Championship.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Oversight and Government Reform.

bill.summary: Congratulates the Covina Pony League Baseball Team of Covina, California, for their victory in the 2017 Pony League World Series championship.
